basics.name: Benedict Aryo
basics.label: Data Scientist
basics.summary:
Currently Data Scientist at Renom Infrastruktur Indonesia.
More than 3 years of experience in IT & Telecommunications industries. Specializes in Delivering AI/Machine Learning Solutions to solve business problems and Deploying Analytical Solutions using Data Science and Statistical Methodology.

Download my CV/Resume in pdf

highlights:
Deliver AI Solutions to the customer using ReNom Machine Learning framework.
Provide Data Analytics solutions using predictive modelling based on customer business need.
Utilize ReNom Products such as Image Analysis, Object Detection in Computer Vision or Regression Model based on business problems.

Giving Data Science Training organized by Make-AI to individuals or corporate training.
Become Speaker to Universities/ Organization about Data Science, and it’s application.
Deliver Netscout© Probing and Geoanalytic Solutions in Smartfren Telecom to solve production network issues and achieving 4G LTE KPI optimization by tackling Network Visibility challenges.

Utilize network analysis tools in large amount of data, such as Netscout Subscriber Intelligence, NGOne, or Wireshark, then finalize it with Excel to provide 4G Network Forensic Analysis for troubleshooting or Preventive maintenance.
Perform Ad-hoc logfile analysis to produce report of sites KPI measurement.
Perform 4G Radio Signal Drive Test to ensure network connectivity & reliability.

awards.title: Finalist of Intel OpenVINO Hackaton 2019
awards.summary: Deliver market ready solutions using OpenVINO AI & Computer Vision to optimize Advertising campaign.

awards.title: Intel Edge AI Scholarship Foundation
awards.summary: Training on how to develop Edge Application
